provenance.name: Tate Collection
provenance.note: Acquired, and probably commissioned, from Blake by Thomas Butts, c. 1799; by inheritance in 1845 to Thomas Butts, Jr.; sold from his collection, Foster and Son auction, London, 29 June 1853, probably lot 71, titled "Christ and Little Children" (10s. to Sir William Stirling-Maxwell), or possibly lot 96, titled "The Church and Christ" (with lot 97, *The Flight into Egypt*, Butlin 404, for 10s. to Sir William Stirling-Maxwell or "Mr. Golding," both collectors); Samuel Prince, sold from his collection Sotheby's, 11 Dec. 1865, lot 281, with *The Flight into Egypt*, Butlin 404 (£12.5s. to "Hayes," probably a dealer); Alfred Aspland by 1876; sold from his collection, Sotheby's, 27 Jan. 1885, lot 93 (£16 to "Gray," probably a dealer); J. Annan Bryce, sold 1904 to W. Graham Robertson; sold from his collection, Christie's, 22 July 1949, lot 27 (£399 to the executors of Robertson's estate for presentation through the National Art Collections Fund to the Tate Gallery, now Tate Collection).

desc.objtitle: Christ Blessing the Little Children, Object 1 (Butlin 419)

objnote.p: Blake signed the work, lower left, with his monogram and dated it; see the textual transcription. An enhanced image of the monogram and date has been provided below. The work may have been trimmed along its lower margin, as indicated by the missing lower reaches of the final two digits in the date. The painting was restored between 1863 and 1876 and again in 1952.

illustration.illusobjdesc: The design is based the description of Christ and children in Mark 10:13-16. In the center of the design sits Jesus on a stone or wooden chair placed in front of a tree trunk. The tree's leafy branches extend along the length of the top of the design. Jesus sits, facing forward, with his arms crossed. He has long hair and a beard and is wearing a gown. A slight radiance around his head suggests a halo. In each arm, Jesus holds a small child. In front of Jesus, in between his legs, stands a nude child (probably male) with short, curly hair, facing away. The child's left leg is extended behind him and is on tiptoe. To the left of Jesus's chair stands a female child, gowned and with long hair. She leans her elbows on the arm of the chair, and faces right; she looks up and holds her hands together as if praying. To the right of Jesus's chair stands a male(?) child. He wears a gown and leans slightly left, facing forward. His legs are crossed and his hands are raised in prayer. To the left of Jesus stand two adults. The leftmost figure is an old man with a beard. He faces right and has his right arm bent upward, with a finger raised as if pointing. The rightmost figure appears to be a gowned female with her hair pulled up into a bun. She stands in contrapposto, with her left leg extended backward slightly and on tiptoe. In her right arm, bent upward, she holds a nude(?) infant. The infant faces right, perhaps looking at Jesus, and has its left arm raised at 45 degrees. To the right of Jesus kneels a woman with five children to the right. The woman faces left and has her left leg extended backward. She wears her hair in a bun with a cord or ribbon round it. The woman's left arm is at her side but bent slightly, as if ushering forward the group of children to the left. The leftmost child of the group kneels, facing left and away. The child wears a gown and has his(?) arms bent upward, with his hands partly covering his face. The child is praying. A group of four children, probably including at least one girl, stands to the left of the woman. Only the head is visible of the leftmost child, who has short hair and faces left. The child second from the left has short, curly hair, wears a gown, and faces away. His(?) left foot is extended back and on tiptoe. Only the face of the child second from the right is visible, facing left. The rightmost child appears to be female. She faces forward, and wears a gown. The background is dotted with grass, indeterminate vegetation, and several leafy trees. The form on the right margin may be a large tree trunk. A river winds through the background and another body of water, possibly a lake, appears right of the kneeling woman's back. Mountains mark the horizon on the right. There are three buildings in the background, including two with columns and one with a tower and a spire. The sky is cloudy with indications of a sunrise or sunset emanating from behind the central tree.

component.illusobjdesc: In the center of the design sits Jesus on a stone or wooden chair in front of a tree trunk. The tree's leafy branches extend along the length of the top of the design.
Jesus sits, facing forward, with his arms crossed. He has long hair and a beard and is wearing a gown. An aura around his head hints at a halo. In each arm, Jesus holds a small child.

In each arm, Jesus holds a small child. There is no clear indication of clothing. The child on the left faced right and has short, curly hair and is probably male. His right arm is bent upward, with the palm of his right hand facing away from the viewer. The child on the right facing left and has long hair and is probably female. Her left arm is bent upward, with the palm his her left hand facing away from the viewer. Both children may be praying and looking up, eyes raised, toward Christ's face.
In front of Jesus, in between his legs, stands a nude child (probably male) with short, curly hair, facing away. The child's left leg is extended behind him and on tiptoe.

To the left of Jesus's chair stands a female child, gowned and with long hair. She leans her elbows on the arm of the chair, and faces forward and to the right; she looks up toward Christ and holds her hands together as if praying.

To the right of Jesus's chair stands a male(?) child. He wears a gown and faces forward, leaning slightly to the left. His legs are crossed and his hands are raised in prayer. He may be looking up toward Christ.
To the left of Jesus stand two adults. The leftmost figure is an old man with a beard. He faces right and has his right arm bent upward, with a finger raised as if pointing.

To he left of Jesus stands two adults. The rightmost figure appears to be a gowned female with her hair pulled up into a bun. She stands in contrapposto, with her left leg extended backward slightly and on tiptoe. In her right arm, bent upward, she holds a nude(?) infant. The infant faces right, perhaps looking at Jesus, and has its left arm raised at 45 degrees.

To Jesus's right kneels a woman near five children. The woman faces left and has her left leg extended backward. She wears her hair in a bun tied with a cord or ribbon. Her gown or skirt does not rise above her waist. The woman's arm is at her side but bent slightly, as if ushering forward the group of children to her left. The palm of her left hand is vertical.

To the right of Jesus kneels a woman near five children. The leftmost child of the group kneels, facing left and away. The child may be male, wears a gown, and has its arms bent upward, with his hands partly covering his face while praying.

To the right of Jesus kneels a woman near five children. A group of four children stand to the left of the woman. Only the head is visible of the leftmost child, who has short hair and faces left. The child second from the left has short, curly hair, wears a gown, and faces away. His(?) left leg is extended back with the left foot on tiptoe. Only the face of the child second from the right is visible, facing left. The rightmost child appears to be female. She faces forward, and wears a gown. She may be looking at the child to the left.
The background is dotted with grass, indeterminate vegetation, and several leafy trees. The form on the right margin may be a large tree trunk.
A river winds through the background.
A body of water, possibly a lake, appears right of the kneeling woman's back.
Grass covers the foreground below the figures.
Mountains mark the horizon on the right.
There are three buildings in the background, two with columns and one (the furthest in the background) with a tower and a spire.
The sky is cloudy with indications of a sunrise or sunset emanating from behind the central tree.
